definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: In the United Kingdom, on the eve of Halloween can be said is a Guijie.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，萬聖節前夕可以說是一個鬼節。

sentences.english: What year was it destroyed on Halloween?
sentences.chinese: 它是哪一年的萬聖節前夜被毀掉的？

sentences.english: E. g. People dress up in costumes for Hallowmas.
sentences.chinese: 人們在萬聖節會化妝成不同的人物。
通常，萬聖節服裝會折射出流行文化的潮流趨勢。

sentences.english: Principal Wu celebrates Halloween with students of PAS.
sentences.chinese: 胡校長與雅校同學歡渡萬聖節。

sentences.english: And the "Scream" mask has become a classic Halloween costume.
sentences.chinese: “驚聲尖叫”面具也成爲經典萬聖節裝飾。

sentences.english: Halloween is represented with orange and black.
sentences.chinese: 萬聖節一般用橘黃色和黑色。

sentences.english: As to black cats, Hallowmas is the most miserable day in a year.
sentences.chinese: 對於黑貓來說，萬聖節是一年中最“悲慘”的日子。

sentences.english: Horace and the Gorgons gossip on the horrible Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉斯和蛇發女怪三姐妹在可怕的萬聖節前夕聊八卦。

sentences.english: The first time I dressed up as a woman was Hallowe'en1).
sentences.chinese: 我第一次男扮女裝是在一次萬聖節前夕。

sentences.english: Downplay the scary, chilling, creepy, parts of Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 淡化萬聖節那可怕，令人膽寒生畏的部分。

sentences.english: Carving pumpkins into jack-o-lanterns is a Halloween custom.
sentences.chinese: 用南瓜雕制南瓜燈是一個萬聖節傳統。

sentences.english: Sexy superhero costumes are reportedly going to be big in the US this Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 有報道稱性感女超人將在美國萬聖節大受歡迎。

sentences.english: Welcome to the first CarnEVIL party at Circus Barbarossa.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到芭芭露莎第一屆鬼屋嘉年華萬聖節派對。

sentences.english: The jiack-o-lantern is the symbol of halloween.
sentences.chinese: 南瓜燈成了萬聖節的標誌。

sentences.english: Some children make lanterns out of pumpkins at Hallowe'en.
sentences.chinese: 有些兒童在萬聖節前夕用南瓜做燈籠。

definition: Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
opera (or role) involving much singing and action/(fig.) highlight/main feature/major activity
to celebrate a festival/after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)
Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)
